effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into flareon, a growlithe into arcanine, a pansear into simisear, or a vulpix into ninetales.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Flareon, a Growlithe into Arcanine, a Pansear into Simisear, or a Vulpix into Ninetales.

flavor_text_entries.text: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. The stone has a fiery orange heart.
